impact-statement: To establish a trade-off between the speed and accuracy of a decision, neurons in lateral intraparietal cortex combine evidence bearing on the decision with a signal that incorporates the cost of time into the decision-making process.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
